about.header: The Lost Hostels, Palolem beach - South Goa
about.info:
Located in the heart of South Goa, just a stone throw away from the famous Palolem beach & other beaches of the area. The Lost Hostel, Goa is based on a theme of varieties of hooks, since we are all hooked on to something, whether it's a job, a passion or a feeling. We Provide you with enough hooks to hang your worries and enjoy the time here. Our goal is to make you feel home away from home with our unique facilities in a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. In our huge garden with loads of space to relax and chill, we always have a fridge full of beer to serve to our lost souls. You can secure stuff in the free luggage lockers. We've got CCTV to help keep you safe and laundry facilities if you need to freshen up your backpacking gear. 
 
  We have board games for a laid-back afternoon and movie nights for these long cozy nights. When you want some quiet time check out the book exchange or use the free Wi-Fi to catch up with family at home. Looking for any recommendations for making the best out of your time in Goa? Our staff can sort it out for you. 
 
  We strive to ensure that our travelers get to stay with us as a part of the family. Travelers choose us because they like to meet new people, share their experience & stories with each other and learn new culture while staying in a homely atmosphere but not for the facilities. Do not choose us if you rate a hostel based on its facilities rather than people and the atmosphere. 
 
 Lost in India with us and get hooked with Goa!!

FAQs.question: What IDs are required at the time of check in?
FAQs.answer: When checking in at Lost Hostel, it is important to have a valid government-issued ID or passport. This requirement applies to all guests, including foreign visitors. If you are a foreign guest, please ensure that you have both your passport and a valid visa with you during the check-in process. These documents are necessary to verify your identity and ensure compliance with local regulations.

FAQs.question: Are pets allowed?
FAQs.answer: At Lost Hostel, we love our furry friends. pets are allowed in the common areas but not in the hostel rooms.

FAQs.question: Can you cook your own food at the hostel?
FAQs.answer: At Lost Hostel Palolem, you don't have to worry about cooking your own meals because we have our own restaurant right here on-site. Unfortunately, we don't have a community kitchen available at Lost Hostel Palolem. So you can simply enjoy the convenience of having delicious meals served to you without any hassle. Our in-house restaurant takes care of all your dining needs during your stay with us.

FAQs.question: Is the common area open 24/7?
FAQs.answer: That's correct! The common area at Lost Hostel is indeed open 24 hours a day, allowing you to enjoy the space and facilities at any time that suits you. Whether you're looking to relax, socialize with other guests, or simply unwind after a long day of exploring, you'll have access to the common area whenever you need it.

FAQs.question: Do they have female dorms?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we are pleased to inform you that we have a female-specific dorm at Lost Hostel. This dorm is exclusively for female guests, providing a safe and comfortable space for female travelers to stay and interact with one another.
